function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of knowledge about virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in built environments","Mitigation":"Education and communication to increase awareness of virus transmission and safety measures","Technologies":"OccSim as a communication tool to visually demonstrate virus transmission and safety measures","People":"General occupants, visitors, customers","Owner":"Health experts, stakeholders, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of transparency in space occupancy and safety","Impact":"Decreased trust in the environment and potential for visitors to leave the building","Mitigation":"Use of OccSim to increase transparency in space occupancy and safety","Technologies":"OccSim for visually demonstrating space occupancy and safety measures","People":"Customers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, stakeholders"}]}
